trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_SEQ_00<tab>Rostnzeh yearns to profess his love to a certain special someone, and requires your help to do so.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_SEQ_01<tab>Rostnzeh has asked you to tell Moraby Drydocks guard Ghimthota of his feelings for her, and to do it with a single La Noscean lilybell. This common flower can be found growing near the lakeside in Empty Heart.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_SEQ_02<tab>You find a La Noscean lilybell, only to be ambushed by a pair of frenzied landtraps. Luckily, the seedkin are no match for you. Now hurry to Ghimthota at the Moraby Drydocks before the flower withers.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_SEQ_03<tab>You deliver the lilybell to Ghimthota, only to learn that she has made a vow to another─her duty.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_TODO_00<tab>Search Empty Heart for a La Noscean lilybell.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the lilybell to Ghimthota at the Moraby Drydocks.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_ROSTNZEH_000_1<tab>Whilst the carvin's help keep me head clear, a bit o' company would ease the solitude. Truth is, with each turn o' the sun I creep ever closer to the brink o' madness.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_ROSTNZEH_000_2<tab>All day and all night, I dream of someone who might rescue me from this prison. Someone broad and hale, with skin the color of the sea, and eyes what'll suck you in like a maelstrom... Someone like Ghimthota...

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_ROSTNZEH_000_3<tab>I's been enchanted by her sweet magicks since I first saw her─a young lass from the Moraby Drydocks on patrol of the Gods' Grip. She smiled at me, but I was too et up inside by fear to meet her gaze. And now, since her promotion to head watch, she can't be bothered to make the climb.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_ROSTNZEH_000_4<tab>I would tell her how it is I feel...but me duty to the sailors─ Wait! Might be <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> could tell her for me! I'd make it worth yer while. Ye could take her a nice La Noscean lilybell. You think she'd like that? Aye, I reckon she'd like that. Ain't met a woman what didn't like flowers.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_GHIMTHOTA_000_10<tab>A gift for <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> from the candlekeep at Oschon's Torch? But I don't recall ever meeting anyone─

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_GHIMTHOTA_000_11<tab>Ah, a La Noscean lilybell... Yes, it's coming back to me now. Rostnzeh, I believe his name was. I remember specifically commenting on how I despised my patrols through the Gods' Grip for the area is full of La Noscean lilybells, and the terrible weeds always send me into sneezing fits.

TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_GHIMTHOTA_000_12<tab>While I am...uh, flattered, I'm afraid I cannot return the gesture. As head watch of the Moraby Drydocks, it is my responsibility to see that the peace is kept until the <var 1A 02 /var>Victory<var 1A 01 /var>'s christening. I simply haven't the time to pay would-be suitors any mind, no matter how desperate they may be.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_GHIMTHOTA_000_13<tab>Though...perhaps once the ship is complete, I <var 1A 02 /var>could<var 1A 01 /var> consider a climb up the peninsula...perhaps.
TEXT_SUBSEA120_00417_SYSTEM_000_20<tab>A pair of creatures have been drawn to the fragrant scent of the lilybell!
